statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_alerts;
SELECT vehicle_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM vehicle_maintenance_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, alert_message, alert_datetime FROM vehicle_maintenance_alerts WHERE vehicle_id = 1001 ORDER BY alert_datetime DESC;
SELECT alert_id, vehicle_id, alert_type FROM vehicle_maintenance_alerts WHERE alert_datetime >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT alert_id, vehicle_id, alert_type, alert_datetime FROM vehicle_maintenance_alerts ORDER BY alert_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_alerts WHERE vehicle_id = 5;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM vehicle_maintenance_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Oil Change' AND alert_datetime >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(alert_id) AS total_alerts FROM vehicle_maintenance_alerts GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY total_alerts DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_alerts WHERE alert_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY alert_datetime DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_id FROM vehicle_maintenance_alerts WHERE alert_type IN ('Oil Change', 'Tire Rotation');
SELECT * FROM vehicle_alerts
SELECT alert_type, alert_date FROM vehicle_alerts WHERE vehicle_id = 10
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM vehicle_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Check Engine'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_criteria
SELECT vehicle_type, maintenance_schedule FROM maintenance_criteria WHERE criteria_id = 5
SELECT * FROM vehicle_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Engine Issue' ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM vehicle_alerts WHERE vehicle_id = 100 ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM vehicle_alerts WHERE alert_date > '2022-01-01' AND alert_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_alerts WHERE alert_type LIKE '%tire%' AND alert_message IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vehicle_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM vehicle_alerts WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM maintenance_criteria WHERE maintenance_due_date < '2023-01-01');
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data;
SELECT vehicle_name, mileage FROM vehicle_data;
SELECT vehicle_name, mileage, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_data WHERE mileage > 50000;
SELECT criteria_name, maintenance_interval FROM maintenance_criteria WHERE maintenance_interval < 6;
SELECT alert_message, alert_date FROM alert_logs ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data WHERE mileage > 5000 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, mileage, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, alert_message FROM vehicle_data JOIN alert_logs ON vehicle_data.vehicle_id = alert_logs.vehicle_id;
SELECT maintenance_interval, criteria_name FROM maintenance_criteria WHERE maintenance_interval < 6 ORDER BY criteria_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, alert_message, alert_date FROM vehicle_data JOIN alert_logs ON vehicle_data.vehicle_id = alert_logs.vehicle_id WHERE alert_date >= '2022-01-01' AND alert_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM VehicleAlerts;
SELECT id, alert_type, alert_message FROM VehicleAlerts WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT make, model FROM VehicleDetails WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceCriteria WHERE criteria_name LIKE 'Oil%';
SELECT id, vehicle_id, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleAlerts WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM VehicleDetails WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year > 2015;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM VehicleAlerts WHERE id = 3;
SELECT make, model, year FROM VehicleDetails ORDER BY year DESC, make ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_type, year_made FROM Vehicles WHERE year_made > 2010;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM Vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT criteria_name, description FROM MaintenanceCriteria WHERE maintenance_interval < 5000;
SELECT Users.username, Vehicles.vehicle_type FROM Users INNER JOIN Vehicles ON Users.user_id = Vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM Vehicles WHERE year_made > 2010;
SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.vehicle_type, m.criteria_name FROM Vehicles v JOIN VehicleMaintenance vm ON v.vehicle_id = vm.vehicle_id JOIN MaintenanceCriteria m ON vm.criteria_id = m.criteria_id;

SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.vehicle_type, a.alert_type FROM Vehicles v JOIN VehicleMaintenance vm ON v.vehicle_id = vm.vehicle_id JOIN AlertLogs a ON vm.maintenance_id = a.maintenance_id WHERE a.alert_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.vehicle_type, u.username FROM Vehicles v JOIN VehicleMaintenance vm ON v.vehicle_id = vm.vehicle_id JOIN Users u ON vm.vehicle_id = u.user_id;
